result.decisionFail: Image is decorative.

result.errorMsg: script may use color alone.
result.decisionPass: script does not use color alone.
result.decisionFail: script uses color alone.

result.errorMsg: script user interface may not be accessible.
result.decisionPass: script user interface is accessible.
result.decisionFail: script user interface is not accessible.

result.errorMsg: script may cause screen flicker.
result.decisionPass: script does not cause screen flicker.
result.decisionFail: script causes screen flicker.

result.errorMsg: h1 may be used for formatting.
result.decisionPass: This h1 element is really a section header.
result.decisionFail: This h1 element is used to format text (not really a section header).

result.errorMsg: Anchor contains no text.
result.repair: Add text to the a element or the title attribute of the a element or, if an image is used within the anchor, add Alt text to the image.

result.errorMsg: Image may contain text that is not in Alt text.
result.decisionPass: Any text in image is also in Alt text or text in image is decorative or redundant.
result.decisionFail: Image contains some text that is not in Alt text.

result.errorMsg: img element may require a long description.
result.decisionPass: Image does not require a long description or a long description is provided.
result.decisionFail: Image requires a long description and is not properly marked.

result.errorMsg: Alt text does not convey the same information as the image.
result.decisionPass: Alt text conveys the same information as the image.
result.decisionFail: Alt text does not convey the same information as the image.

result.errorMsg: This image may contain text with poor contrast.
result.decisionPass: Image does not contain text with a poor contrast ratio.
result.decisionFail: Image contains text with poor contrast ratio.

result.errorMsg: Image may be using color alone.
result.decisionPass: There are no references to this image using color alone.
result.decisionFail: There is a reference to this image using color alone.

result.errorMsg: Image may contain text with poor contrast.
result.decisionPass: Image does not contain text with a poor contrast ratio.
result.decisionFail: Image contains text with poor contrast ratio.

result.errorMsg: Alt text is not empty and image may be decorative.
result.decisionPass: Image is not decorative.
result.decisionFail: Image is decorative.
